text: :wave:  - i’m having an issue automatically pulling in related blog posts based on the tags.
i followed <@U2H3TT8F2>’s tutorial, but get no results. is there something wrong with my code, or did the module change, perhaps? thanks in advance!
Hey <@UHNTV662V>, i don't think anything has changed in this module since I wrote up that article but I'll take a look at your post tonight and see if I can figure it out.
No problem always happy to try and help others.

Hey <@UHNTV662V> I tried your code on a test site and I am not able to pull back anything but when i tested it on our normal site, it seems to work. I dont know how it actually looks and decides what posts to pull in but that is odd. <@U6GNQ7JBU> would you know who over at HS might be able to take a look at this? (oh wait i see you tagged <@UD5NW4PJ5> above).
strange! thanks for taking a look and tagging in the appropriate peeps!
